verses.kjv: Let brotherly love continue.
verses.ct: Keep loving each other as brothers and sisters.

verses.kjv: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers: for thereby some have entertained angels unawares.
verses.ct: Don't neglect to show hospitality to strangers, because by doing so, some people have welcomed angels without even realizing it.

verses.kjv: Remember them that are in bonds, as bound with them; and them which suffer adversity, as being yourselves also in the body.
verses.ct: Think about those who are in prison as if you were locked up alongside them. Care about those who are mistreated, since you also live in a physical body and could face the same thing.

verses.kjv: Marriage is honourable in all, and the bed undefiled: but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge.
verses.ct: Marriage should be respected by everyone, and the marriage bed kept pure, because God will judge the sexually immoral and those who commit adultery.

verses.kjv: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
verses.ct: Live free from the love of money, and be satisfied with what you have. After all, God himself has said, 'I will never leave you or abandon you.'

verses.kjv: So that we may boldly say, The Lord is my helper, and I will not fear what man shall do unto me.
verses.ct: So we can say with confidence, 'The Lord is my helper, and I won't be afraid of what any person can do to me.'

verses.kjv: Remember them which have the rule over you, who have spoken unto you the word of God: whose faith follow, considering the end of their conversation.
verses.ct: Think about your leaders who taught you God's message. Look at how their lives turned out, and follow their example of faith.

verses.kjv: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
verses.ct: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever.

verses.kjv: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines. For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace; not with meats, which have not profited them that have been occupied therein.
verses.ct: Don't get swept away by all kinds of unfamiliar teachings. It's good for your heart to be strengthened by grace, not by food regulations, which have never actually helped the people who followed them.

verses.kjv: We have an altar, whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle.
verses.ct: We have an altar that those who serve in the tabernacle have no right to eat from.

verses.kjv: For the bodies of those beasts, whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin, are burned without the camp.
verses.ct: The bodies of the animals whose blood the high priest carries into the Most Holy Place as an offering for sin are burned outside the camp.

verses.kjv: Wherefore Jesus also, that he might sanctify the people with his own blood, suffered without the gate.
verses.ct: That is why Jesus also suffered outside the city gate — so that he could make the people holy through his own blood.

verses.kjv: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp, bearing his reproach.
verses.ct: So let's go to him outside the camp, sharing in the disgrace he endured.

verses.kjv: For here have we no continuing city, but we seek one to come.
verses.ct: Because we don't have a permanent city here on earth — instead, we're looking forward to the city that is coming.

verses.kjv: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
verses.ct: Through Jesus, then, let's continually offer God a sacrifice of praise — that is, words from our lips that openly acknowledge his name.

verses.kjv: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
verses.ct: And don't forget to do good and to share with others, because these are the kinds of sacrifices that please God.

verses.kjv: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.
verses.ct: Follow the direction of your leaders and respect their authority, because they watch over your souls as people who will have to give an account. Let them do this with joy and not with frustration, since that would be of no benefit to you.

verses.kjv: Pray for us: for we trust we have a good conscience, in all things willing to live honestly.
verses.ct: Pray for us. We're confident that we have a clear conscience and want to live honorably in every way.

verses.kjv: But I beseech you the rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.
verses.ct: I especially urge you to pray for this so that I can be returned to you sooner.

verses.kjv: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,
verses.ct: Now may the God of peace — who brought back from the dead our Lord Jesus, the great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the eternal covenant —

verses.kjv: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: equip you with everything good so that you can carry out his will. May he produce in you, through Jesus Christ, what is pleasing in his sight. To him be glory forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: And I beseech you, brethren, suffer the word of exhortation: for I have written a letter unto you in few words.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, I ask you to receive this word of encouragement patiently, since I've written only a short letter to you.

verses.kjv: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.
verses.ct: I want you to know that our brother Timothy has been released. If he arrives soon, I'll come with him to see you.

verses.kjv: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.
verses.ct: Give my greetings to all your leaders and to all of God's people. Those from Italy send their greetings to you.

verses.kjv: Grace be with you all. Amen.
verses.ct: Grace be with all of you. Amen.
